channel.title: sprites on Arcane Energy
channel.description: Recent content in sprites on Arcane Energy

item.title: Animated Explosions Pack #1
item.description: Add smooth looking explosions to your game! A collection of explosions to add to your game! Create frame by frame explosions with these animations. Included spritesheets, individual frames for each spritesheets and a sample Godot project! The Godot project is made with version 3.4.4. Information Frames: 128x128 .png format Spritesheets: 25 FPS Spritesheet data 8x8 (64 Frames) 8x5 (40 Frames) 6x4 (24 Frames) 10x5 (50 Frames) 22x10 (220 Frames) 10x5 (50 Frames) 10x5 (50 Frames) 10x10 (100 Frames) 10x5 (50 Frames)
item.content:
Add smooth looking explosions to your game!

A collection of explosions to add to your game! Create frame by frame explosions with these animations.

Included spritesheets, individual frames for each spritesheets and a sample Godot project! The Godot project is made with version 3.4.4.

Information

Frames:

  • 128x128
  • .png format

Spritesheets:

  • 25 FPS

Spritesheet data

  1. 8x8 (64 Frames)
  2. 8x5 (40 Frames)
  3. 6x4 (24 Frames)
  4. 10x5 (50 Frames)
  5. 22x10 (220 Frames)
  6. 10x5 (50 Frames)
  7. 10x5 (50 Frames)
  8. 10x10 (100 Frames)
  9. 10x5 (50 Frames)
